item.description:
From NHC'er Josh:

The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Division is hosting a Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Black Bear in New Haven on Thursday, November 8, 2007. The event is from 5:30 till 8:00. Black Bear will be providing drink specials and some free appetizers. This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals.

Drink Specials: Black Bear will be providing select free drinks for the 1st hour and $4 "you call it" till 8:00.

Josh is your contact for this event, and can be reached at 203-772-0070
item.name: Thurs. 11/8 - Young Professional Networking Happy Hour @ Black Bear
